Access to SharePoint resources by privil.Data: SharePoint Access Logs, Windows Event ID 4624
Access to SharePoint resources by privil.Action: Collect and parse SharePoint Access Logs. Filter for access events by known privileged accounts (e.g., Domain Admins, Enterprise Admins). Correlate these accesses with typical activity baselines for these accounts. Investigate any access to SharePoint resources by these accounts.

A single user account or a small group o.Action: Collect and parse SharePoint Access Logs. Group access events by user and time window (e.g., hourly, daily). Count the number of distinct documents/pages accessed per user per time window. Use statistical methods (e.g., Z-score, percentile analysis, or IQR) to identify users whose access volume significantly deviates from their baseline or the overall user population mean/median. Investigate accounts showing unusually high access volume.
